gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pistons 129, Wizards 117
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pistons defeated the Wizards, 129-117. Alec Burks recorded a season-high 34 points, and a career-high eight 3PM for the Pistons, with Jalen Duren adding 20 points (8-8 FGM) and 19 rebounds in the victory. Tyus Jones tallied 22 points, seven assists, and six rebounds for the Wizards in the losing effort. The Pistons improve to 4-36 in the regular season, while the Wizards fall to 7-32.
